import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import ImagePopup from './ImagePopup' import { api } from "../utils/api"; export default function Main ({ onEditProfile, onAddPlace, onEditAvatar }) { const [userName, setUserName] = useState('') const [userDescription, setUserDescription] = useState('') const [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = useState('') useEffect(() => { console.log(api.getUserInfo) }, []); return (

{userName}

{userDescription}

    Вы уверены?

    ) }
